name: Vayne
description: The privileged daughter of a wealthy merchant who commissions a dagger from the blacksmiths. She is portrayed as somewhat arrogant and demanding.

name: Blacksmith
description: A craftsperson who creates objects from metal using forging techniques.

name: Forging
description: The process of shaping metal by heating and hammering.

name: Potential
description: Kael’s hidden abilities and the possibility of becoming a skilled blacksmith, which begins to surface during the chapter.

name: Master Griswold
description: A seasoned blacksmith and Kael’s mentor. He provides guidance and recognizes Kael’s growing potential.

name: Dagger
description: A small, pointed blade commissioned by Vayne.

name: Kael
description: An 18-year-old apprentice blacksmith striving to improve his skills and prove himself. He experiences a surge of potential towards the end of the chapter.

name: Ancient Force
description: A mysterious power observing Kael, hinting at a larger conflict or destiny.
